title: flow steering
extract: A fundamental flow (e.g. the westerly zonal flow) that exerts a major influence on the motion of some specific smaller disturbances that are embedded within it. In the case of tropical cyclones, the steering flow is largely responsible for their actual track. From: steering flow in A Dictionary of Weather »
